headline: Warren Buffett Is Being Fearful While Others Are Greedy. Is It a Warning?
summary: It seems quite clear that Berkshire Hathaway (NYSE: BRK.A) (NYSE: BRK.B) CEO Warren Buffett is turning bearish on the stock market.  Berkshire looks set to finish its second straight year as a net seller of stocks, and it has never dumped so many shares in its history.  Through the first three quarters of 2024, Berkshire has sold $133.2 billion in stock, the majority of it Apple (NASDAQ: AAPL).

raw.headline: Warren Buffett Is Being Fearful While Others Are Greedy. Is It a Warning?
